title: Do I Follow My Fear or My Heart
itunes:title: Do I Follow My Fear or My Heart
description:
Dear Steve I met a gentleman about three months ago and we have been enjoying a platonic friendship. Lately it's become apparent that we are feeling each other on a deeper level and I have a strong physical attraction to each other. The other day during a discussion about herbal supplements versus prescription drugs he revealed that he has no choice but to take prescription drugs because he is HIV positive.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve I met a gentleman about three months ago and we have been enjoying a platonic friendship. Lately it's become apparent that we are feeling each other on a deeper level and I have a strong physical attraction to each other. The other day during a discussion about herbal supplements versus prescription drugs he revealed that he has no choice but to take prescription drugs because he is HIV positive.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: iHeartPodcasts
